metadata.name: Suspicious Java Children Processes
metadata.comment: Detects java process spawning suspicious children

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/java')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bash')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dash')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ksh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zsh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('csh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fish')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('curl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wget')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('python'))))

output.summary: Detects java process spawning suspicious children
